SimpleMapCache.java   
1   package org.apache.lucene.util.cache;
2

19  
20  import java.util.HashMap;
21  import java.util.Map;
22  import java.util.Set;
23  
24  /**
25   * Simple cache implementation that uses a HashMap to store (key, value) pairs.
26   * This cache is not synchronized, use {@link Cache#synchronizedCache(Cache)}
27   * if needed.
28   */
29  public class SimpleMapCache extends Cache {
30    Map map;
31    
32    public SimpleMapCache() {
33      this(new HashMap());
34    }
35  
36    public SimpleMapCache(Map map) {
37      this.map = map;
38    }
39    
40    public Object get(Object key) {
41      return map.get(key);
42    }
43  
44    public void put(Object key, Object value) {
45      map.put(key, value);
46    }
47  
48    public void close() {
49      // NOOP
50    }
51  
52    public boolean containsKey(Object key) {
53      return map.containsKey(key);
54    }
55    
56    /**
57     * Returns a Set containing all keys in this cache.
58     */
59    public Set keySet() {
60      return map.keySet();
61    }
62    
63    Cache getSynchronizedCache() {
64      return new SynchronizedSimpleMapCache(this);
65    }
66    
67    private static class SynchronizedSimpleMapCache extends SimpleMapCache {
68      Object mutex;
69      SimpleMapCache cache;
70      
71      SynchronizedSimpleMapCache(SimpleMapCache cache) {
72          this.cache = cache;
73          this.mutex = this;
74      }
75      
76      public void put(Object key, Object value) {
77          synchronized(mutex) {cache.put(key, value);}
78      }
79      
80      public Object get(Object key) {
81          synchronized(mutex) {return cache.get(key);}
82      }
83      
84      public boolean containsKey(Object key) {
85          synchronized(mutex) {return cache.containsKey(key);}
86      }
87      
88      public void close() {
89          synchronized(mutex) {cache.close();}
90      }
91      
92      public Set keySet() {
93        synchronized(mutex) {return cache.keySet();}
94      }
95      
96      Cache getSynchronizedCache() {
97        return this;
98      }
99    }
100 }
101
  SimpleMapCache.java
